dcterms:creator: T. E. de Campos
B. Rakesh Babu
M. Varma
dcterms:description: The Chars74K dataset contains character images consisting of handwritten images, computer font images, and scene text images. It focuses on recognizing characters in situations that would traditionally not be handled well by OCR techniques, with a total of 36 labels including 26 letter characters (a-z) and 10 numeric characters (0-9).
dcterms:title: Chars74K

dcterms:creator: A. Mishra
K. Alahari
C. v Jawahar
dcterms:description: The IIIT 5K-word dataset is obtained from Google Image search results, containing 5000 pieces of word text images taken from external environmental images and digital images. It focuses on recognizing text extracted from natural scene images and the web.
dcterms:title: IIIT 5K-word
